Figure.description: Insert a figure with a label and/or caption

Table.description: Insert a table with a label and/or caption

Include Block.description: Include block content from another document.

Call Block.description: Execute another document and include the content.

Do Block.description: Create an instruction to insert block content.

Do Inline.description: Create an instruction to insert inline content.
Do Inline.$comment: No closing brackets because configuration has autoClosingPairs for those so likely already present

Insert Block.description: Propose the insertion of block content.

Insert Inline.description: Propose the insertion of inline content.

Delete Block.description: Propose the deletion of block content.

Delete Inline.description: Propose the deletion of inline content.

Replace Block.description: Propose the replacement of block content.

Replace Inline.description: Propose the replacement of inline content.

If Block.description: Only show block content if the expression is true.

For Block.description: Repeat block content for each value of a variable in an expression.
